traits.name: Guiding Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The initiate can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
